text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that if a cease and desist letter fails, the user's client could file a lawsuit. Section 3.3, under 'Civil injunction & damages,' explicitly states: 'File a preliminary injunction (ordinanza ingiuntiva) in the Tribunale of the jurisdiction where the vendor operates' if the vendor refuses to comply after the cease-and-desist. This directly satisfies the requirement.", "criterion_id": "786be8ed-633a-4993-9191-9e94790d4b0a"}
